titleStmt.title: To the King's most excellent Maiesty. The humble petition of the commissionerrs of the General Assembly of the Kirk of Scotland, met at Edenborough Ianuary, 4. 1642. And now lately presented to His Majesty, at Oxford. With His Maiesties gratious answer thereunto March 16. 1642.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the Vniversity,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed by His Majesties command at Oxford, March. 20. :

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Peterborough Cathedral.
